price: 92. Marnaba ma haleeleysaan ajarka wanaagsan (ee lagu muto Jannada) jeer aad bixisaan wax ka mid ah waxaad jeceshihiin; waxaad bixisaanna oo wuxuun ah, hubaal Alle wuu Ogsoon yahay.
arabic: لَن تَنَالُواْ ٱلۡبِرَّ حَتَّىٰ تُنفِقُواْ مِمَّا تُحِبُّونَۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lan tanālū al-bira ḥattā tunfiqū mimmā tuḥibbūna wamā tunfiqū min shayin fa-inna al-laha bihi ʿalīmun
